mapper.sql: SELECT a.message_no, a.send_user_no, delete_by_receiver, delete_by_sender , a.receive_user_no, a.content, a.send_date, read_yn, b.user_nicknm, b.image FROM tb_message a join tb_user b on a.send_user_no = b.user_no

SELECT count(*) FROM tb_message WHERE receive_user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_message WHERE send_user_no = #{user_no}

SELECT a.message_no, a.send_user_no, a.receive_user_no, a.content, a.send_date, read_yn, b.user_nicknm, delete_by_receiver, delete_by_sender, b.image FROM tb_message a JOIN tb_user b ON a.receive_user_no = b.user_no WHERE a.send_user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY a.send_date DESC, a.message_no DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_message (send_user_no, receive_user_no, content) VALUES(#{send_user_no}, #{receive_user_no}, #{content})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_message WHERE message_no = #{message_no} AND receive_user_no = #{receive_user_no}
